titleStmt.title: Hereafter foloweth the knowledge, properties, and the vertues of herbes.
titleStmt.author: Wyer, Robert, fl. 1530-1556, printer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Robert Wyer, dwellynge in saynt Martyns parysshe, at the sygne of saynt Iohn Euangelyst, besyde Charynge Crosse.,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date from STC (2nd ed.)..
Title page ornaments; initials; printer's device (McK. 69) at colop.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
